773.title: Yahoo's copyright license for photos, graphics, audio and video limited for purpose

tosdr.case: Copyright license limited for the purposes of that same service but transferable and sublicenseable
tosdr.tldr: The copyright license granted to Yahoo for photos, graphics, audio and video is limited “solely for the purpose for which such Content was submitted or made available”.
